In the fall 2020 semester, 20 RISD graphic design grad students completed the Oldenberg Inventory, an instrument to measure burnout. This is a summary of responses to just one question from the inventory.

Introducing RISD‚Äôs new aggressive covid response: the Protect Our Outstanding People initiative will ensure safe operations and classes. RISD‚Äôs P.O.O.P. initiative is at the forefront of all university action, and hopefully, the success of RISD‚Äôs P.O.O.P. will serve as an example for the rest of higher ed. We created P.O.O.P. through radical imagination and creative problem solving! If we work hard, we can all P.O.O.P. together! No one poops until we all P.O.O.P.! (@risdwfh)

The signature of Rosanne Somerson, president of RISD

Since I became a zoom student, my companions are cute animals‚ÄîI watch live stream of animals when I work on projects. This web based project is to dedicate the time that I spent with my favorite otter, Ivy.
